name: Sales Order Lookup by Circuit ID
query:
SELECT
    so.name AS "Sales Order:Link/Sales Order:200",
    so.transaction_date AS "Sales Order Date:Date:130",
    so.order_type AS "Order Type::150",

    so.customer AS "Customer::200",

    CASE
        WHEN so.docstatus = 0 THEN 'Draft'
        WHEN so.docstatus = 1 THEN 'Submitted'
        WHEN so.docstatus = 2 THEN 'Cancelled'
    END AS "SO Status::120",

    so.po_no AS "PO No::150",
    so.custom_task AS "Task::150",

    soi.custom_feasibility AS "Circuit ID:Link/Site:180",
    s.date AS "Ckt Delivery Date:Date:140",
    soi.custom_circuit_id_renewal AS "Circuit ID (Renewal):Link/Site:180",

    s.site_name AS "Site Name::180",
    s.site_status AS "Site Status::120",

    soi.item_code AS "Item Code:Link/Item:150",
    soi.item_name AS "Item Name::200",
    soi.rate AS "Rate:Currency:120",
    soi.qty AS "Qty:Float:100",
    soi.amount AS "Amount:Currency:140"

FROM
    `tabSales Order` so

LEFT JOIN
    `tabSales Order Item` soi
        ON soi.parent = so.name

LEFT JOIN
    `tabSite` s
        ON s.name = soi.custom_feasibility

ORDER BY
    so.creation DESC;
report_name: Sales Order Lookup by Circuit ID
